top_comments.comment: Do the hermits just not like normal biomes so they decide to make their own. First cub now ren, plus ren made mustafar and tatooine last season lol
That intro song never gets old

comments_since_last_sample.body: there's a simple way to make them pay somewhere that is not in the shulker box: make a payment system that rewards the buyer ever n purchases (lets say that after every 50 diamonds it dispenses 1 back). that way even if 2 hermits pay in the wrong container the 3rd hermit is incentivized to grab the money that others paid and place it in the correct container
Mentioned on Doc’s vid…rename the diamonds/derp coin on the barrels to “Pay in here”….
If you decide the dead coral reef thing isn't what it looks like, you can say it is covered in ash from all the industry going on.
REN! USE 1 FREE FOR 2 AND NOT DIRECTLY 1 FREE
I thought the concrete powder looked like salt. Like the ocean is drying up and leaving a thick crust of salt behind. It looks great!
